title: How to Make a Duct Tape Band

steps.headline: Get a piece of duct tape and either tear it in half and then fold it in half, lengthwise, or just fold it in half, lengthwise.
steps.description: It depends on how wide you want your band to be. Wrap it around what you want to use it for and make it a little larger.

steps.headline: Fold it in half, lengthwise, and wrap a piece of duct tape around it to fasten it and make it a complete circle.
Make sure that it is still fits where you need it to, then take another half strip of duct tape.
steps.description: Tape it to the band at an angle. Start wrapping it around the band of duct tape. Do this all the way around.

steps.headline: Put it on the object, like on the strobe that you see here.

text: Get a piece of duct tape and either tear it in half and then fold it in half, lengthwise, or just fold it in half, lengthwise. It depends on how wide you want your band to be. Wrap it around what you want to use it for and make it a little larger. Fold it in half, lengthwise, and wrap a piece of duct tape around it to fasten it and make it a complete circle.  Make sure that it is still fits where you need it to, then take another half strip of duct tape. Tape it to the band at an angle. Start wrapping it around the band of duct tape. Do this all the way around. Put it on the object, like on the strobe that you see here.
